create.title: Night of the Living Dead
create.overview: A group of people trapped in a farmhouse must survive the night as the dead rise and feast on the living.

duplicate.title: Dawn of the Dead
duplicate.overview: Survivors of a zombie outbreak take refuge in a shopping mall, but soon face external and internal threats.

to_remove.title: 28 Days Later
to_remove.overview: A man wakes up from a coma to find London overrun by a rage-fueled virus, forcing him to fight for survival.

data.title: Zumbieland
data.overview: A group of survivors navigate a zombie-infested America using their own set of survival rules.

data.title: World War Z - Zumbi
data.overview: A former UN investigator races against time to stop a global zombie pandemic from consuming humanity.

data.title: REC - Zumbis
data.overview: A reporter and her cameraman find themselves trapped in an apartment building during a terrifying viral outbreak.
